name: dBSB
short_description: dBSB is a single file, pure perl subroutine collection for reading BSB raster maps  on a per-row basis used in the bigger DiGiTrip.it project, a nautical navigation & GPS program working on Win, Mac and Linux written in Perl/Tk

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)

os.fullname: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)
